name: DEPLOY ALL SHIELDS!
description:
DEPLOY ALL SHIELDS is an arcade classic shoot-em-up in which you can only use your enemies bullets AGAINST THEM to destroy them.

Move with WASD or  ←↑↓→ and use the spacebar to DEPLOY YOUR SHIELDS and reflect the bullets of your enemies against them.

Be sure to play it on fullscreen for better view of the game space and MAXIMUM DODGING CAPABILITIES
